roleset.name: to change form, shape, etc, compression with a spiral motion
roleset.note: TWIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'twist' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from twist.01-v predicate notes)
TWIST-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on twist-v.01. Corresponds toVNcls coil-9.6, knead-26.5. (from twist.01-n)

example.name: transitive with manner
example.text: The husky blond guide with the Aggie cap twists his face in mock fury .
example.arg: The husky blond guide with the Aggie cap

example.name: with ADJ and arg1
example.text: Now , in a strange twist in all of this ...

example.name: just arg0
example.text: I visited some of them only yesterday including one Marine whose life was saved by a twist of fate .

example.name: both args
example.text: Agreement , disapproval , boredom and distraction all can be inferred from the subjects ' twist of a dial .

roleset.name: mentally disturbed
roleset.note: TWISTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from twisted.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Yea . I do really like him but I want us to be friends first . Can u explain this to him ? Like I really want us to get to knowhim . I m not gon na sleep w hi m . He gets too twisted about shit
